trans-unit.source: Represents the auth:AdditionalContext element defined in the authorization extensions to WS-Trust.
trans-unit.target: 表示授权：在授权中定义的 AdditionalContext 元素扩展到 WS-Trust。

trans-unit.source: These extensions are defined in the WS-Federation specification.
trans-unit.target: 这些扩展指定在 WS-Federation 中定义。

trans-unit.source: The auth:AdditionalContext element can be used to communicate any additional context for a token request (RST).
trans-unit.target: Auth:AdditionalContext 元素可以用于通信的令牌请求 (RST) 任何其他上下文。

trans-unit.source: This context is provided as a collection of name-value pairs, each of which corresponds to a single auth:ContextItem subelement.
trans-unit.target: 此上下文是提供作为名称 / 值对的集合，其中每个对应于单个 auth:ContextItem 子元素。

trans-unit.source: The auth:ContextItem element is represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.ContextItem> class.
You can access the list of context items through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.AdditionalContext.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问通过上下文项的列表<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.AdditionalContext.Items%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the element that this class represents, see the WS-Federation specification.
trans-unit.target: 有关此类表示的元素的详细信息，请参阅 WS 联合身份验证规范。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.AdditionalContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.AdditionalContext" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.AdditionalContext" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.AdditionalContext" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.AdditionalContext" /> class with the specified context items.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的上下文项初始化 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.AdditionalContext" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of context items for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取此实例的上下文项的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.ContextItem" /> objects that provide context for the request (RST) as a collection of name-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.ContextItem" /> 为请求 (RST) 提供上下文作为名称值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty list.
